document_data.name: Alasturan Malatheer
document_data.mainbody: '''Alasturan Malatheer''' was a shopkeeper in [[Neverwinter]] in [[1374 DR]].
document_data.History: He was also the local representative of the female adventuring company, the [[Galadran Company]], and collaborated often with the [[Soft Claws]]. Unknown to him, his good friend [[Zundaerazylym|Amundra Nelaerdra]] was the leader of the Soft Claws, and a [[steel dragon]].
document_data.Personality: Alasturan was always in control of himself. His shop sold maps and charts.
